alert.note: Alert for Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 15 at 7:04AM CDT until August 17 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Oso Creek Near Corpus Christi affecting Nueces County. For the Oso Creek...including Corpus Christi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oso Creek Near Corpus Christi. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Moderate lowland flooding occurs, from the headwaters near Violet Road, or Farm to Market 24, to Oso Bay. Secondary roads and low bridges near the creek are also flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 22.0 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Oso Creek Corpus Christ 20.0 12.1 Mon 6 am 22.0 19.6 13.9 9.7 7.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
